name: Summation/Sigma
description: Summation with sigma notation

name: Left Arrow
description: The left arrow symbol represents a leftward direction or implication.

name: Long Left Arrow
description: The long left arrow symbol represents a longer leftward direction or implication.

name: Double Left Arrow
description: The double left arrow symbol represents a logical implication or equivalence in a leftward direction.

name: Long Double Left Arrow
description: The long double left arrow symbol represents a longer logical implication or equivalence in a leftward direction.

name: Right Arrow
description: The right arrow symbol represents a rightward direction or implication.

name: Long Right Arrow
description: The long right arrow symbol represents a longer rightward direction or implication.

name: Double Right Arrow
description: The double right arrow symbol represents a logical implication or equivalence in a rightward direction.

name: Long Double Right Arrow
description: The long double right arrow symbol represents a longer logical implication or equivalence in a rightward direction.

name: Double Left-Right Arrow
description: The double left-right arrow symbol represents a bidirectional flow or equivalence.

name: Long Double Left-Right Arrow
description: The long double left-right arrow symbol represents a longer bidirectional flow or equivalence.

name: Double Double Left-Right Arrow
description: The double double left-right arrow symbol represents a logical equivalence or bidirectional implication.

name: Long Double Double Left-Right Arrow
description: The long double double left-right arrow symbol represents a longer logical equivalence or bidirectional implication.

name: Maps To
description: The maps to symbol represents a mapping from one set to another.

name: Hook Left Arrow
description: The hook left arrow symbol represents a hooked leftward direction or implication.

name: Hook Right Arrow
description: The hook right arrow symbol represents a hooked rightward direction or implication.

name: Left Harpoon Up
description: The left harpoon up symbol represents a leftward pointing harpoon or implication.

name: Right Harpoon Up
description: The right harpoon up symbol represents a rightward pointing harpoon or implication.

name: Left Harpoon Down
description: The left harpoon down symbol represents a leftward pointing harpoon or negation.

name: Right Harpoon Down
description: The right harpoon down symbol represents a rightward pointing harpoon or negation.

name: Right and Left Harpoons
description: The right and left harpoons symbol represents a reversible reaction or equivalence.

name: Leadsto
description: The leadsto symbol represents a step-by-step transformation or process.

name: Up Arrow
description: The up arrow symbol represents an upward direction or implication.

name: Up-Down Arrow
description: The up-down arrow symbol represents a bidirectional flow or equivalence in an upward and downward direction.

name: Upwards Double Arrow
description: The upwards double arrow symbol represents an upward logical implication or equivalence.

name: Nearrow
description: The nearrow symbol represents a northeast arrow direction.

name: Down Arrow
description: The down arrow symbol represents a downward direction or implication.

name: Searrow
description: The searrow symbol represents a southeast arrow direction.

name: Downwards Double Arrow
description: The downwards double arrow symbol represents a downward logical implication or equivalence.

name: Swarrow
description: The swarrow symbol represents a southwest arrow direction.

name: Up-Down Arrow with Horizontal Bar
description: The up-down arrow with horizontal bar symbol represents a bidirectional flow or equivalence in both upward and downward directions.
